Articles.Content:
I was browsing through the forums looking for something and ran across [this post](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36572-I-am-full-of-grief-and-coffee?p=462017&viewfull=1#post462017) from a fondly remembered, venerable thread.

> 
> Good lord, that thing is absurd! The physics engine doesn't freak out with that many components? I've avoided doing so because of that.

Ah, sweet, wistful irony.

Did you notice what was in the post he was replying to?

> 
> A poet kerbonaut eh?
> Hi there!
> 
> [http://i267.photobucket.com/albums/ii282/technicalfool/Jool%20Explorer/screenshot1765_zpsa36ae8ab.png~original](http://i267.photobucket.com/albums/ii282/technicalfool/Jool%20Explorer/screenshot1765_zpsa36ae8ab.png~original)
> 
> ^^Give it a week, you'll be making stuff that makes this look like a firecracker.

Some impressive prescience there.
